REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f5028 reute b f BC-U.K.-MONEY-MARKET-GIV 03-17 0051

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET GIVEN 120 MLN STG LATE HELP
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it provided the money market with late assistance of around 120 mln stg. This brings the bank's total help today to some 136 mln stg and compares with its forecast of a 400 mln stg shortage in the system. REUTER
